price: Sε Yεma onipa ka ahummͻborͻ bi fri Yεn hͻ hwε, na afei Yɛyi (ahummͻborͻ no) fri ne so a, afei hwε, na wapa aba, reyi (Nyame) boniayε.
arabic: وَلَئِنۡ أَذَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِنَّا رَحۡمَةٗ ثُمَّ نَزَعۡنَٰهَا مِنۡهُ إِنَّهُۥ لَيَـُٔوسٞ كَفُورٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wala-in adhaqnā al-insāna minnā raḥmatan thumma nazaʿnāhā min'hu innahu layaūsun kafūrun
